| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | [SLASH'EM\_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line462](/wiki/SLASH%27EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line462 "SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/monst.c") |

A **rabid wolf** is a new monster in [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"). They have slightly more hitpoints than regular [wolves](/wiki/Wolf "Wolf"), and their bite is [poisonous](/wiki/Poisonous "Poisonous").

## Strategy

These are not a huge threat, since they are no faster than a normal player. Take them down with [ranged weapons](/wiki/Ranged_weapon "Ranged weapon") if you lack [poison resistance](/wiki/Poison_resistance "Poison resistance") and/or [magic cancellation](/wiki/Magic_cancellation "Magic cancellation"), since their bite does have the potential to cause [instadeath](/wiki/Instadeath "Instadeath"). Unlike [rabid rats](/wiki/Rabid_rat "Rabid rat"), the corpses of rabid wolves are safe to eat, and in fact provide a decent amount of [nutrition](/wiki/Nutrition "Nutrition").
html:
Rabid wolf

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
d rabid wolf
Difficulty 8
Attacks Bite 2d4 poisonous (constitution)
d rabid wolf
Difficulty 8
Attacks

Bite 2d4 poisonous (constitution)

Base level 6
Base experience 73
Speed 12
Base AC 4
Base MR 0
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 500
Nutritional value 250
Size Small
Resistances None
Resistances conveyed None

A rabid wolf:

  • has no hands.
  • is an animal.
  • is carnivorous.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • can be seen through infravision.
  • does not appear in Gehennom.
  • may turn against you when tame.
Reference SLASH'EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line462

A rabid wolf is a new monster in SLASH'EM. They have slightly more hitpoints than regular wolves, and their bite is poisonous.

Strategy

These are not a huge threat, since they are no faster than a normal player. Take them down with ranged weapons if you lack poison resistance and/or magic cancellation, since their bite does have the potential to cause instadeath. Unlike rabid rats, the corpses of rabid wolves are safe to eat, and in fact provide a decent amount of nutrition.

Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Rabid_wolf&oldid=74822"

A '''rabid wolf''' is a new monster in [[SLASH'EM]].  They have slightly more hitpoints than regular [[wolf|wolves]], and their bite is [[poisonous]].
==Strategy==
These are not a huge threat, since they are no faster than a normal player.  Take them down with [[ranged weapon]]s if you lack [[poison resistance]] and/or [[magic cancellation]], since their bite does have the potential to cause [[instadeath]].
Unlike [[rabid rat]]s, the corpses of rabid wolves are safe to eat, and in fact provide a decent amount of [[nutrition]].
